Uses of Interface
be.belgium.eid.objects.SmartCardReadable

Packages that use SmartCardReadable
be.belgium.eid.objects   
be.belgium.eid.security   
 

Uses of SmartCardReadable in be.belgium.eid.objects
 

Classes in be.belgium.eid.objects that implement SmartCardReadable
 class IDAddress
          The IDAddress class represents the address of the holder of the current beID card.
 class IDData
          The IDData class represents the ID data of a certain beID card.
 class IDPhoto
          The IDPhoto class contains the photo of the holder of the current beID card.
 class IDTokenInfo
          The IDTokenInfo class contains the token information of the smart card.
 class IDVersion
          The IDPIN class contains the version information of the smart card.
 

Uses of SmartCardReadable in be.belgium.eid.security
 

Classes in be.belgium.eid.security that implement SmartCardReadable
 class AuthenticationCertificate
          This class contains the Authentication certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
 class CACertificate
          This class contains the Certificate Authority certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
 class Certificate
          The certificate class is an abstract class for the different kinds of certificates stored on the smart card.
 class HardCodedRootCertificate
          The HardCodedRootCertificate class contains the hard coded root certificate for the BEID against which other certificates should be verified.
 class RNCertificate
          The RN certificate is the (National Register) certificate for verifying identities.
 class RootCertificate
          This class contains the Root certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
 class SignatureCertificate
          This class contains the signature certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
